name: search_for_a_item
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool league_of_legends_galore.
Tool description: Get Details aboat players, champions, and more!

Check the About page for details on every API!
API description: This will go through the list of items and return a single item or a list of items depending on YOUR request!

champsynergy.description: The champion synergy to filter items by.

itemsynergy.description: The item synergy to filter items by.

price.description: The price category to filter items by.

name.description: The name of the item to search for. Defaults to 'sword'.
